author: Benni
post_text: March 22, 2020 at 11:06 AM#1Hello everybody,I will make a new Macro for Update Sequences with new content in Presets. For example. I have the fixture X with 1 P Channel for the Prisma. The Rotation for the Prisma is included in this channel. Then I clone my show to fixture y. This fixture as 1 Channel for the Prisma and 1 for the Rotation. After i have cloned my show. I updated my Presets with the Rotation Channel.And here is the point I need my new Macro.I need it to bring the Rotation Channel to my Programmed Cues. I will use Searchresults.Here is the was what i Think to do, but it doesn't bring the new Attribute to the Cue.setvar $updatedPreset=x.ysearch Preset $updatedPresetselfix Preset $updatedPresetat Preset $updatedPresetstore Sequence 1 Thru if SearchResult /mclearallsetvar $updatedPreset=""Have anyone a Idea why it doesn't work, or a other idea.Thank you for your help

This fixture as 1 Channel for the Prisma and 1 for the Rotation. After i have cloned my show. posts.author: scoobytoobins
posts.post_text: March 22, 2020 at 8:15 PM#2your issue here is going to be that 5th line.i don't believe 'store sequence 1 thru if searchresult /m' is accepted syntax for multiple reasons.i would update your preset (with 'add new content'). copy that to a new preset and then replace preset [original] with preset [new]. this should include your added data wherever that preset was used.

title: Update Marco for new Preset Content
